games.description: Third-person space flight game where the player pilots a spaceship, avoids asteroids, and hits gates to trigger 4-option multiple-choice questions. Suitable for ages 8+, requires 3D navigation skills.

Side-scrolling platformer where the player moves a dinosaur, jumps across gaps, and hits gates to trigger 4-option multiple-choice questions. Suitable for ages 6+, requires basic timing and movement skills.

Side-scrolling platformer like line-rider-dino but with a colorful fairy character in a fantasy world. Suitable for ages 6+, requires basic timing and movement skills. Works only with multiple-choice question format.
